abstract: Colorado Rockies sign right-handed relief pitcher Adam Ottavino to three-year contract; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Colorado Rockies agreed to a three-year, $10.4 million contract with the right-handed reliever Adam Ottavino.
snippet: The Colorado Rockies agreed to a three-year, $10.4 million contract with the right-handed reliever Adam Ottavino.
